title.en: Ontology Publication Template for the PMD

comments.en:
This is an example ontology to help PMD partner projects to get an overview over the formal requirements imposed by HAP 4. 
                                           It's meant as a blueprint for updating the partner projects ontologies and thus does not carry any relevant concepts. This 
                                           file is related to the github repository https://github.com/materialdigital/ontology_publication_template where there is 
                                           more information about how to work with this example.

bibliographicCitation.value: Doe J. (1960) Foo Ontology. Journal of Everything, 42(42), 3-42.

title.value: Ontology Publication Template for the PMD
